content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. Your apartment is indeed very appealing, especially its location in the city center. I was hoping we could start the negotiation at a reasonable price. What is the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your interest in my property. As you can see, it's a brand new, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment that's close to all amenities. To ensure a fair deal, I'm willing to start the negotiations at €1,200 per month. Is this a price that you would consider reasonable?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your offer of €1,200 per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment, even though the location is excellent. I was hoping for a more competitive starting point. Could we perhaps discuss a lower price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I understand your concern. However, the demand for apartments in the city center is quite high, and the quality of my property reflects the premium price. Nevertheless, I'm willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to offer €1,100 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your willingness to negotiate is much appreciated. I would be willing to offer €950 per month for this apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the current market conditions.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your offer of €950 per month is significantly lower than my initial suggestion. While I appreciate your effort to reach a deal, I must decline. I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and location of this apartment and is willing to pay a fair price for it. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. However, I believe that with some further discussion, we can find a price that is fair for both parties. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to €1,000 per month? This would reflect a balance between the quality of the apartment and the current market rates.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your persistence is commendable. I'm willing to listen to your reasoning. Why do you believe €1,000 per month is a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I value the quality and location of your apartment, but I must also consider my budget as a student. €1,000 per month strikes a balance that acknowledges the premium of your property while aligning with my financial constraints. I'm confident that this price would be mutually beneficial.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, as a landlord, I must consider many factors, including the cost of maintenance and the competitive market. I appreciate your perspective as a student, and I'm willing to negotiate further. Would you be prepared to offer €1,050 per month? This would be a fair starting point for us to continue our discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your counter-offer of €1,050 per month is more aligned with my expectations. I'm prepared to agree to this price if it includes utilities such as water and heating. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your willingness to meet in the middle is encouraging. I can agree to include water and heating in the €1,050 per month price. Additionally, I will provide a one-month rent-free period as an incentive for you to sign a one-year lease. This offer is valid only if we agree on a price now. Is this a deal you would be willing to accept?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your offer of €1,050 per month, including utilities, and a one-month rent-free period is very generous. It reflects your confidence in the quality of your apartment and your willingness to accommodate a student's budget. I am prepared to sign a one-year lease under these terms. I agree to the price of €1,050 per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I'm glad to hear that you find my offer acceptable. We have a deal at €1,050 per month, including utilities, with a one-month rent-free period for signing a one-year lease. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Thank you for your time and effort in reaching this agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
